author: cms-sw
body: This should fix the cuda source files (.cu) source dependency issue we have seen in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49230#issuecomment-3455913861 . compilter was dumping `path/objectfile.cu.o :` while https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-config/blob/scramv3/SCRAM/findDependencies.py was expecting `path/objectfile.cu.o:`  i.e. no space before `:`. New config tag contains a fix for this
title: configtag V09-08-12 which contains fix for cuda source file dependency
